name: My Hot Cousin FUTANARI EDITION
description:
Some years ago you and your parents used to live in the same block as your uncle, and you used to play with your cousin almost every day... But it wasn't always fun... You still remember very well how she used to harass you back in the day...  And it still hurts you as soon as you start to think about it. But it was a long time ago... After you moved from there  everything had improved in your life...  Now she's coming again... But you're no longer a little kid, you've grown up... Maybe it's time to teach her a lesson...

What's different in Futanari Edition? The cousin is actually a Futanari!

If you like these games support us on patreon.com/kravenar
